course_title: Topics in Human Health: Mental Well-being & Resilience
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 100 / Seats Avail: 35Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Building upon what cutting-edge science tells us about how to maximize mental well-being, this course will explore a wide range of strategies for using both positive and negative emotions to build the psychological resilience and flexibility needed to thrive in challenging times.
